---
title: "shared.ts"
---

## High-level description
This code defines constants and configurations for a CommonWell FHIR proxy. It sets up essential variables and default error responses for handling FHIR-related operations, particularly for DocumentReference and Binary resources.

## Symbols

### `proxyPrefix`
#### Description
A constant string that serves as a prefix for the CommonWell FHIR proxy.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| proxyPrefix | string | The prefix string for the CommonWell FHIR proxy |

### `fhirServerUrl`
#### Description
Retrieves the FHIR server URL from the configuration.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| fhirServerUrl | string | The URL of the FHIR server |

### `pathSeparator`
#### Description
A constant string representing the path separator used in URLs.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| pathSeparator | string | The path separator character |

### `binaryResourceName`
#### Description
A constant string representing the name of the Binary resource in FHIR.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| binaryResourceName | string | The name of the Binary resource |

### `docReferenceResourceName`
#### Description
A constant string representing the name of the DocumentReference resource in FHIR.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| docReferenceResourceName | string | The name of the DocumentReference resource |

### `defaultError`
#### Description
An object representing the default error response structure for FHIR operations.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| defaultError | object | The default error response object |

## Dependencies
| Dependency | Purpose |
|:-----------|:--------|
| Config | Used to retrieve the FHIR server URL from the configuration |

## References
This code references the `Config` class from the `shared/config.ts` file, specifically using the `getFHIRServerUrl()` method to retrieve the FHIR server URL.

The constants and configurations defined in this file are likely used in other parts of the CommonWell FHIR proxy implementation, such as the `cw-fhir-proxy.ts` file, which sets up the routing for DocumentReference requests.
